ComicInfo.Summary: In the Dreamscape, anything can happen. So when Katie begins investigating a case that threatens to get out of control, she realizes that she may have bitten off more than she can chew, raising the question: can Dream Police die? And if so, can she survive the darkness she has unwittingly unleashed? Meanwhile, Joe Thursday continues having fl ashes of memory concerning a former partner that neither he nor anyone else can remember. To solve this mystery, he will have to begin asking questions no one wants to answer...questions that threaten the very foundations of the Dreamscape.
ComicInfo.Tags: Echoes,Frank Stafford,Dreamscape,Changelings,Joe Thursday,Mary James,Dream Police,Hugh Ross,Katie Black
